histore.archive.writer module¶

Abstract class that defines the interface for the archive writer.

class histore.archive.writer.ArchiveWriter(row_counter: int)¶

Bases: object

The abstract archive writer class defines the methods for adding rows to an output archive. The writer maintains an internal counter to assign unique identifier to document rows.

abstract write_archive_row(row: histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow)¶

Add the given row to a new archive version.

Parameters

row (histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow) – Row in a new version of a dataset archive.

write_document_row(row: histore.document.row.DocumentRow, version: int)¶

Add a given document row to a new archive version with the given identifier. Uses the internal row counter to assign a new unique row identifier.

Parameters

  • row (histore.document.row.DocumentRow) – Row from an input document (snapshot) that is being added to the archive snapshot for the given version.

  • version (int) – Unique identifier for the snapshot version that the document row is added to.

class histore.archive.writer.ValidatingArchiveWriter(writer: histore.archive.writer.ArchiveWriter)¶

Bases: histore.archive.writer.ArchiveWriter

Wrapper for another archive writer. Ensures that archive rows are ordered in descending order of their key values. Raises a ValueError if an attempt is made to write rows that are not in order.

property row_counter¶

Counter for archive rows.

Returns

Return type

int

write_archive_row(row: histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow)¶

Add the given row to a new archive version.

Raises a ValueError if the row key is lower than the key of the previous row that was written.

Parameters

row (histore.archive.row.ArchiveRow) – Row in a new version of a dataset archive.
